title: Relates to yearling buck protection
summary: Relates to yearling buck protection program.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          394

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. GUNTHER, CAHILL -- read once and referred to the
         Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the  environmental  conservation  law,  in  relation  to
         establishing the yearling buck protection program

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The environmental conservation law is amended by  adding  a
    2  new section 11-0914 to read as follows:
    3  S 11-0914. YEARLING BUCK PROTECTION PROGRAM.
    4    1.  DEFINITIONS.  A.  AN  "ANTLERED DEER" IS DEFINED AS A DEER WITH AT
    5  LEAST ONE ANTLER MEASURING THREE INCHES OR MORE IN LENGTH.
    6    B. "WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT UNIT" MEANS WILDLIFE REGIONS AS DEMARCATED  BY
    7  THE DEPARTMENT OF ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION.
    8    2. RESTRICTIONS AND APPLICATION. A. ANY PERSON WHO HUNTS OR TAKES DEER
    9  UNDER  A  VALID  PERMIT  OR  LICENSE  DURING THE BOWHUNTING, REGULAR AND
   10  MUZZLELOADING DEER SEASONS IS RESTRICTED TO THE  HUNTING  OR  TAKING  OF
   11  DEER  WITH  AT  LEAST  ONE ANTLER WITH AT LEAST THREE POINTS. EACH POINT
   12  MUST BE AT LEAST ONE INCH LONG MEASURED FROM THE MAIN ANTLER BEAM.
   13    B. THIS PROGRAM APPLIES TO ALL PUBLIC  AND  PRIVATE  LAND  WITHIN  THE
   14  SPECIFIED WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT UNITS.
   15    3.  WILDLIFE  MANAGEMENT UNITS. THESE RESTRICTIONS SHALL ONLY APPLY TO
   16  WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT UNITS 3C, 3H, 3J, 3K, AND THAT PORTION  OF  UNIT  3A
   17  SOUTH AND WEST OF STATE ROUTE TWENTY-EIGHT.
   18    4.  EXEMPTIONS  FROM  REQUIREMENTS. HUNTERS UNDER THE AGE OF SEVENTEEN
   19  ARE EXEMPT FROM THE PROVISIONS OF THIS SECTION AND  MAY  TAKE  ANY  DEER
   20  WITH AN ANTLER OR ANTLERS MEASURING THREE INCHES OR MORE IN LENGTH.
   21    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.


        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01900-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to establishing the yearling buck protection program
